sentences.en: Changing the wage structure is fraught with political and economic problems.
sentences.cn: 收入结构的改变纠缠于一大堆政治与经济问题.

sentences.en: Encouraging women to have more babies used to be politically fraught.
sentences.cn: 鼓励妇女多生育通常充满政治色彩.

sentences.en: In this case, it is a subtle red, fraught with mystery.
sentences.cn: 如果这样的话, 这是一种充满神秘的无以名状的红色.

sentences.en: It has been a somewhat fraught day.
sentences.cn: 这是让人有些担忧的一天。

sentences.en: Nevertheless, entering a new war zone is fraught with dangers.
sentences.cn: 然而, 进入新开辟的战场总是充满危险.

sentences.en: She had a life fraught with hardship.
The earliest operations employing this technique were fraught with dangers.
sentences.cn: 最早使用这种技术的手术充满了危险。

sentences.en: The expedition through the jungle was fraught with difficulty and danger.
sentences.cn: 穿越森林的探险充满着艰辛和危险.

sentences.en: The journey was fraught with difficulties.
The long journey through the forest was fraught with danger.
sentences.cn: 穿越森林的长途旅行充满了危险.

sentences.en: The long journey through the tropical forest was fraught with danger.
sentences.cn: 穿越热带从林的长途旅行充满了危险.

sentences.en: The tobacco looked healthy and green and fraught for Mary -- with promise of future plenty.
sentences.cn: 烟草长得碧绿茁壮,在玛丽看来,一定预兆丰收.

sentences.en: Their marriage has been fraught with difficulties.
There's no need to look so fraught!
sentences.cn: 用不着那麽愁眉苦脸的.

sentences.en: THIS has been another fraught week for the world's financial markets.
sentences.cn: 对于全球金融市场来说,这又是令人提心吊胆的一周.

sentences.en: You're looking very fraught, Mildred! Is there anything the matter?
sentences.cn: 米尔德丽德! 看起来你忧心忡忡,有什么不对劲 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: 充满的，满载的，担心的，忧虑的
